headline: Flood, Drought, and Climate Change Photos
title: National Geographic
description: Explore National Geographic. A world leader in geography, cartography and exploration.
content: OceanXplorers National Geographic Society funds the best and brightest individuals dedicated to scientific discovery, exploration, education and storytelling to illuminate and protect the wonder of our world. National Geographic Explorers are continuing to push the boundaries of knowledge, uncovering new insights about the natural and cultural worlds, and strengthening our connection to them and one another.
